snippet: Washington, which had baseball’s best record this regular season, is in danger of seeing its postseason come to an end if the Nationals fail to beat the Cardinals on Thursday.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column warns that the Washington Nationals, who had baseball’s best record this regular season, are in danger of seeing their postseason come to an end if they fail to beat the St Louis Cardinals in Game 4 of the National League division series.
lead_paragraph: Washington, which had baseball’s best record this regular season, is in danger of seeing its postseason come to an end if the Nationals fail to beat the Cardinals on Thursday.

headline.seo: Cardinals Teeing Off on Nationals’ Starters
